alert.note: Alert for Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 09 at 4:07PM PDT until September 09 at 5:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR CENTRAL NYE COUNTY... At 407 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Radar indicates between 1.0 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Central Nye County The Pahute Mesa rain gauge has recorded 1.03 inches of precipitation so far, with 0.93 inches of that precipitation falling within a one hour period. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
